bibl.title: Dispatch from Robert Scott Newton to J. C. Bancroft Davis
Despatches from United States consuls in St. Paul de Loanda, 1854-1893

correspAction.persName: Davis, J. C. Bancroft (John Chandler Bancroft), 1822-1907

revisionDesc.change: Creation of individual xml files, review, and addition encoding

div1.opener: United States Consulate St Paul de Loanda
div1.p: Mr. Robert Scott Newton to the Department of State
Subject-- Advising death of Mr W. W. Bagster Chief of the Boston Missionary Expedition

opener.dateline:
United States Consulate
St Paul de Loanda
16th March 1882

div1.p:
Sir,
For the information of the Department I have the honor to advise you of the death of Mr. W. W. Bagster, Chief of the Missionary Expedition, who proceeded into the Interior in November 1880.
He died at Bailunda, on the 22nd February ulto of Fever and congestion of the Brain

closer.salute:
I have the honor to be,
Your obedient servant
closer.signed:
Robt S Newton
US Vice Consul
